metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7273 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The IMAP-over-SSL implementation in getmail 4.0.0 through 4.43.0 does not verify X.509 certificates from SSL servers, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof IMAP servers and obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.

criterions.comment: getmail4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
